# Java

```java

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
		static int n,m;
		static int[] a;
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		n = sc.nextInt();
		a= new int[n];
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			int temp = sc.nextInt();
			a[i] =temp;
		}
		
		Arrays.sort(a);
		m = sc.nextInt();
		
		for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
			int temp = sc.nextInt();
			binarySearch(temp);
		}
		
		
	}
	private static void binarySearch(int target) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int mid;
		int left =0;
		int right = n-1;
		
		while(left <= right) {
			mid = (left+right)/2;
			
			
			if(a[mid] ==target) {
				System.out.println("1");
				return;
			}
			
			if(a[mid] < target) {
				left= mid+1;
			}
			
			if(a[mid] > target) {
				right= mid-1;
			}
			
			
		}
		
		System.out.println("0");
	}

}

```
